name: Wizard Academy VR Cardboard
description:
You need the RealControl system from Realiteer for the best experience, download for FREE at:
www.realiteer.com/technology

Wizard Academy is an immersive shooting and learning games in Virtual Reality. The Wizard Academy app launches you into a magical land where you can experience learning and gaming in a brand new way. 

Wizard Academy contains
GermBuster Village: shoot mega germs in VR.
Fire Archery: speed up your algebra like never before.
Ice Fortress: destroy ice castles, but you need to know a little physics.
Earth Maze: Finding yourself trapped in a maze and surrounded in danger, you have to find you way out before it’s too late. Put your spatial memory to a test.
Telekinesis: The space is an endless mess, use your telekinesis power to bring back order.

To fully enjoy this app you'll need a Virtual Reality Viewer and a motion-tracking controller, such as the RealViewer and the RealControl. Learn more and get your own RealViewer and RealController at www.realiteer.com. Share your experience through on Facebook and Twitter community by using #WizardAcademy.
